name: Status Buddy
author: Maulik Kanani

sections.description:
Install plugin to availability of all buddypress members
This plugin require Buddypress already installed.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.
1. Upload status-buddy.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory and extract it.
1. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Is it show live status?

it will update status in 5 seconds of delay.

What is the formula for Away status?

If there is no activity for user till 5 minutes, it will be considered as an away.

What is the formula for offline status?

If there is no activity for user till 30 minutes or logged out, it will be considered as an away.

short_description: Here is a short description of the plugin.  This should be no more than 150 characters.  No markup here.

screenshots.caption: You can see all the tree type of user status it will be changes as per WordPress heartbeat.
